thread.title: Borussia Dortmund closing in on a deal for Arsenal youngster Gedion Zelalem
thread.title_full: Borussia Dortmund closing in on a deal for Arsenal youngster Gedion Zelalem

author: John Cross
title: Borussia Dortmund closing in on a deal for Arsenal youngster Gedion Zelalem
text:
Sport Borussia Dortmund closing in on a deal for Arsenal youngster Gedion Zelalem Midfielder Zelalem, 19, was very highly thought of at Arsenal but has struggled to make progress towards the first team Share Gedion Zelalem of Arsenal during the EFL Cup Fourth Round match between Arsenal and Reading (Photo: Stuart MacFarlane) Share Get Arsenal FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
German giants Borussia Dortmund are closing in on a deal for Arsenal youngster Gedion Zelalem. 
Midfielder Zelalem, 19, was very highly thought of at Arsenal but has struggled to make progress towards the first team and had a loan spell at Rangers. 
He has represented both USA and Germany at youth level and his contract expires at the end of the season. 
A move to Germany would mean Arsenal only get a training compensation fee so it has yet to be agreed and Dortmund are negotiating a potential loan with a view to a permanent switch. Zelalem of Arsenal is closed down by Tom Carroll during a reserve game (Photo: Getty) 
Zelalem joined Arsenal for Olney Rangers in 2013 but in the three years thaat have followed he has failed to make a single Premier League appearance. 
He has, however, played in the League Cup this season, featuring against both Nottingham Forest and Reading. Like us on Facebook
